article: president clinton swooped down on california thursday both bearing and seeking gifts , offering a daytime dollop of new federal money to help communities start innovative schools and raising a nighttime nest egg for the democratic party with a little help from the stars .
abstract: clinton brings federal funds to california and raises campaign
